caption.title: Effectiveness of larviciding in reducing the expected number of secondary CHIKV infections.
caption.p: Distribution across all sites and both years, disaggregated by coverage value (lighter colour: 30%; darker colour: 50%), intervention timing (starting date every 15 days between May 1 st and September 1 st) and effort level (i.e., number of larvicide applications with monthly frequency (from 1 to 4). Grey bars: optimal starting date; shaded area: duration of intervention.
